thread.section_title: Celebrity Style, Fashion, Beauty, and Red Carpet | PEOPLE
thread.title: Catherine Zeta-Jones’ Closet Is So Large Is Deserves Its Own Zip Code: See Inside!
thread.title_full: Catherine Zeta-Jones’ Closet Is So Large Is Deserves Its Own Zip Code: See Inside!

author: Colleen Kratofil
title: Catherine Zeta-Jones’ Closet Is So Large Is Deserves Its Own Zip Code: See Inside!
text:
Email Getty 
We’ve seen a lot of outrageous celebrity closets over the years. Some have their own water fridges , others their own champagne doorbells , so we didn’t think there was much left to shock us, that is, until we saw inside Catherine Zeta-Jones’s wardrobe. Let’s just say, the space probably has its own zip code. 
On Instagram the actress shared a video of a “zip” through her closet, and she wasn’t exaggerating. Set to the noise of a roaring race car engine, the camera literally zips through the halls (yes, halls !) of her closet briefly pausing in certain sections. A video posted by Catherine Zeta-Jones (@catherinezetajones) on Feb 3, 2017 at 10:11am PST 
And it was in those pauses that we discovered shelves and shelves of top-handle handbags and stiletto pumps. We were also dazzled by racks of color-coordinated clothing. And we can’t forget to point out — there are special racks specifically dedicated to scarves.
